ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Gangon looked over in time to see the battle between the new bot and her buddy s of Mantella and Drazom fighting with Wrath and Kamodia. Sheesh! Did you see

Gangon looked over in time to see the battle between the new bot and her bu=
ddy's of Mantella and Drazom fighting with Wrath and Kamodia.

"Sheesh! Did=
 you see that dragon bot throw his girlfriend at the enemy like that? Whoo!=
 I would never do that to you BrightBlade. If I could pick you up in the fi=
rst place, that is." Gangon said. Lightmare smiled at the idea as she looke=
d at BrightBlade...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards=
 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, June 06, 2000 1:36 AM
  Subjec=
t: Neo Beast Wars


  *In the People's Base, Wrath and Kamodia convert to r=
obot mode and come out of the hidden passage way in the swamp and run into =
the jungle and see Drazom and Mantella next to a stasis pod and a Scorpion.=
 They hide in a bush listening to every word* *Over with Drazom and Mantell=
a* Mantella: We come in peace. *The new bot converts to robot mode. Then Ma=
ntella holds her hand out for a hand shake* *Mantella: I'm Mantella and thi=
s is Drazom. *Mantella says while pointing at Drazom. Drazom does a little =
wave* Stingtra: I'm Stingtra. *Stingtra says while shaking Mantella's hand*=
 Drazom: Maybe you'd like to join us? Stingtra: That'd be great. It beats l=
ooking for a base anyday! *Wrath and Kamodia hear this from the bush their =
hiding in* Wrath: Well well well, If it isn't Stinktra and the sideshow fre=
aks! *Wrath says as he and Kamodia step out from behind the bush* *Stingtra=
's optics narrow*  *Stingtra pulls out her Machine gun and starts shooting =
at Kamodia while Drazom picks Mantella up and throws her at Wrath attemping=
 to knock him down but instead Wrath catches Mantella holds her up in air a=
nd throws her the ground. Then Kamodia slips under the Machine gun shots an=
d charges at Stingtra knocking her down. Wrath then picks Mantella up and p=
ins her to a tree and starts puching her but it doesn't last long before Dr=
azom walks over and punches Wrath and with that Wrath falls on his bum hold=
ing his face. Then Drazom pulls him up and starts kneeing him in the gut an=
d then drops him to the ground. Stingtra starts head butting Kamodia in the=
 face till Kamodia gets off of Stingtra. Then Stingtra jumps to her feet an=
d picks up a stick and runs at Kamodia with it but Kamodia grabs the stick =
and swings Stingtra around drops her on ground. And Kamodia charges at Stin=
gtra but Stingtra is on her back and she scoops Kamodia up on her feet and =
flips her face first into a tree and Kamodia falls to the ground in pain. T=
hen Stingtra jumps to her feet. Wrath climbs to his feet and kicks Drazom i=
n gut. Then Wrath starts rapidly punching Mantella over and over again till=
 she spits poison in his optics. Wrath falls to the ground yelling being bl=
ind at the moment* Drazom: I think Quickstrike is going to welcome you with=
 open arms. *Drazom says to Stingtra *Drazom, Mantella and Stingtra convert=
 to beast mode and then Drazom bends down letting Stingtra climb up  on his=
 back and then he grabs Mantella in his arms and takes of flying towards th=
e Predacon base*
